faqs.title: How do I track my order?
faqs.para: Once your order is shipped, you’ll receive an email with a tracking number to follow your package.

faqs.title: Can I return or exchange an item?
faqs.para: Yes! We offer easy returns and exchanges within 30 days of your purchase. Simply visit our returns page for more details.

faqs.title: How do I know my size?
faqs.para: Check out our size guide for detailed measurements. If you’re still unsure, our customer service team is happy to help!

faqs.title: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.para: You can reach us via email at support@trendflow.com or by using the chat feature on our website. We’re here to help!

faqs.title: Can I cancel my order?
faqs.para: Orders are processed quickly, but if you need to cancel, contact us as soon as possible, and we’ll try to help before it ships.

faqs.title: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.para: Currently, we only ship within the country, but we're working on expanding to more locations soon!
